item.title: CMDIS Annual Research Symposium Abstract Deadline Announcement
item.description: Date: Saturday, December 13, 2025 12:00 AM - Fri., January 9, 2026 11:55 PM - The Center for Materials, Devices and Integrated Systems (CMDIS) Annual Research Symposium will take place on Friday, February 6, 2026, at the Heffner Alumni House. Abstract submissions for talks, posters, and Art-in-Science are due Sunday, January 4, 2026, at 11:59 PM. Contributions across microelectronics, materials, energy, sustainability, modeling, manufacturing, robotics, and control are welcome. Details and…

item.title: Annual State Fire Inspections Begin January 13
item.description: The New York State Office of Fire Prevention and Control (OFPC) conducts annual building inspections of all colleges and universities in New York State. This year, inspections of RPI’s academic and administrative buildings will begin on January 13 and are expected to take approximately six to seven weeks.

item.title: Understanding Today’s Students: Practical tools to support learning, engagement, and well-being
item.description:
The Mainstreaming Mental Wellbeing Taskforce, in collaboration with the Provost’s office and the Division of Human Resources, has developed a two workshop training series to provide RPI faculty and staff with practical tools for understanding today’s students and responding to their evolving needs. Registration for Spring 2026 sessions is open. Lunch is provided!

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
